EmailTemplate.name: ECEMEA Lead Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: URGENT: Inquiry Reminder for {!Lead.Company}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Lead Manager,
The following person : {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName} from {!Lead.Company} has recently contacted us.
The initial request was assigned to you : http://www.salesforce.com/{!Lead.Id} Unfortunately, the lead was not updated since its creation. Please take appropriate action and update the information in the system.
Should you need assistance to do so, please contact your local key user or Michel Mayor.
Best regards, DIMC Team
